H0.text: Which English town is situated close to the most easterly point of the United Kingdom . Great Yarmouth

H1.text: Which English town is situated close to the most easterly point of the United Kingdom . Felixstowe

H2.text: Which English town is situated close to the most easterly point of the United Kingdom . Clacton-on-Sea

H3.text: Which English town is situated close to the most easterly point of the United Kingdom . Lowestoft

A4.text: Lowestoft is the most easterly UK settlement.

A5.text: Ness Point, the easternmost location in the United Kingdom, is located in the town close to a 126-metre wind turbine, known locally as Gulliver.
